programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: The Greater Caucasus
programme.desc: The mountains of the Caucasus form a magical border between Europe and Asia. Film-maker Henry M. Mix and his crew spent over a year in Russia's highest mountains. The result is an impressive documentary about the natural wonders to be found between the Black and Caspian Seas. The wild mountain landscape with its extreme climate has created a unique world of flora and fauna and makes the Caucasus one of the world's 25 most significant centres of biodiversity. Mountain bison, Caucasus Snowcock and tur are only found here. In the rain shadow of the snow-covered main ridge live Saiga antelopes, long-eared hedgehogs and short-toed snake eagles. Epic footage, breath-taking aerial photography and hitherto unseen behaviour of rare animals - Greater Caucasus has its viewers spellbound from the first minute on.

programme.title: The Kaiser's Pirates
programme.desc: In November 1916, German raider SMS Wolf set out for a 15-month long voyage through the oceans finally reaching Australia and Papua New Guinea. The mission of this ship which was perfectly masked as a merchant vessel: capture, sink or destroy allied shipping.

programme.title: Gold for Kim
programme.sub-title: A Life for North Korea's Leader
programme.desc: North Korea is a country of stark contrasts. On the one hand, it presents real socialist stereotypes like cryptic messages from a frozen time loop, combined with shocking reports on shortages. On the other hand, polished Pyongyang lures with a futuristic skyline, flashy amusement parks and department stores with a range of goods equal to those in western consumer meccas.

programme.title: The Secret of the Phaistos Code
programme.desc: Is the Phaistos Disc a clever fake? The film follows the trail of possibly one of the greatest archaeological scandals ever. The search for the truth starts in the ancient Cretan palace complexes of Phaistos. The North American art dealer Jerome Eisenberg, one of the world's foremost forgery experts, considers the “Phaistos Disc” to be a latter-day fake. In 1908, it was discovered by the Italian archaeologist Luigi Pernier. Since then, the disc has aroused the scientific ambition of countless linguists. The British academic Gareth Owens has analyzed new archaeological discoveries with unfamiliar characters and believes the disc to be genuine. But Eisenberg remains convinced that the disc cannot be deciphered at all. He claims that not only does it not reveal a text that has ever been decipherable, but also that is not even of ancient origin.

programme.title: The Lesser Caucasus
programme.sub-title: Between Ararat and the Caspian Sea
programme.desc: The mountain worlds of the Greater and Lesser Caucasus mark the border between Europe and Asia. After their documentary about the Greater Caucasus, Henry J. Mix and his team have now prepared a second film about the impressive mountain world of this region. The species and landscape diversity of the lesser Caucasus are portrayed in Armenia, Georgia and Azerbaijan. Shielded from the more than 4000-metre-tall main ridge of the Greater Caucasus, a thermophilic flora and fauna was able to develop in the Lesser Caucasus. For the first time, the astonishing variety of the land bridge between Europe and Persia is portrayed comprehensively. From the mountains of Dagestan, down to the canyons of the Caspian Basin, through the steppes of Azerbaijan and up into the Armenian highlands, all before the majestic backdrop of biblical Mount Ararat.

programme.title: The Return of the Osprey
programme.desc: The Osprey is the only raptor in the world to feed exclusively on fish. This migratory bird has lived throughout central Europe for a long time, nesting there in the summer months. But the species has gradually moved to more northerly regions of the continent, far from the persecution caused by human expansion. Wendy and Denis have set launched an ambitious challenge of reintroducing the Osprey to Switzerland, a century after its disappearance.

programme.title: Aging in the Wild
programme.desc: In this episode, we explore how different animal species react to impending death. We explore the factors that lead animals to their final resting places: disease, injury, predation, drought, famine.

programme.title: If There Was No Land On Earth
programme.desc: The first episode tells about the fascinating annual migration of the Humpback whales to the warm and tranquil waters of Tonga's Vava'u archipelago, where they mate, give birth, and nurture their young. The majesty and intelligence of these magnificent creatures is truly breathtaking. From the playful antics of newborn calves through the haunting songs of adult males to the human impact on their habitats and lives – an inspiring journey.

programme.title: If There Was No Land On Earth
programme.desc: The third episode is a story about the rich cultural heritage and remarkable skill of the shipbuilders of Sulawesi told by an amazing local craftsman. We will watch as they construct and sail traditional wooden vessels that have been passed down through generations. We will follow the gripping story of the Carnatic, a British ship that wrecked on the coral reef in 1869, discover how the crew survived and how the treasure they carried was salvaged.

programme.title: If There Was No Land On Earth
programme.desc: Embark on an immersive journey through the heart of the Indo-Pacific as we explore the breathtaking coral reef ecosystem, home to an array of vibrant fish species and magnificent manta rays. Let's unearth the secrets of a prehistoric cave nestled within this underwater wonderland and marvel at the stunning beauty of the shoals of fish that dance around us. The vibrant colors and intricate details of this marine paradise offer a mesmerizing glimpse into the world beneath the waves that captivate with the majesty and wonder of the coral reef, as we witness nature at its most spectacular.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode the volunteers experience close up encounters with iconic creatures. It's not often people can experience a walk with elephants and really appreciate the size of these beasts. Giraffe also happen to wonder close which makes the experience even more epic. The volunteers get to handle paint ball guns to get an understanding of how the anti poaching team operates and it seems like Kristina is a pretty good shot! And, nothing stands in the way of hard work, as it's all hands on deck securing electric strands to a border fence. This will dramatically improve the security at Imire.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode the volunteers discover the community's role in conservation and give a hand with some of the building projects. Honey harvesting proves hair-raising for a number of volunteers, particularly Kristina, who has a bee sting phobia …. Who could blame her! A new addition bolsters the conservation efforts in the form of an amazing tracker dog called Merwe. This is a special Dutch Shepherd breed that has an incredible combination of a heightened sense of smell, speed and formidable teeth. It's always a privilege to be able to get close to black rhino and it can often be quite an emotional moment for some of the volunteers, as is the case with Jane who can't hold the tears back as she feeds Tafika for the last time.

programme.title: Project Tiger
programme.desc: “Project Tiger” is the largest and most ambitious conservation project in history. Its success is celebrated around the world, but until now the full story has remained hidden. Marking “Project Tiger's” 50th Anniversary this documentary offers intimate wildlife sequences with rare insight into the tigers' personal world and the ancient forests where they thrive, while unique access to never-before-seen undercover footage reveals the shocking truths of multi-national wildlife crime networks. Set against the backdrop of India's extraordinary growth and transformation, this incredible story is told in full for the first time by the people who have lived and breathed the traumas and the triumphs of five decades of tiger conservation in India.

programme.title: Asia
programme.sub-title: Secret Lives Hidden Places II - S2 E05
programme.desc: The jungle in northern Vietnam is nearly impenetrable, with some areas never touched by humans. The remote rainforests of Pu Mat National Park serve as a refuge for endangered wildlife such as black bears, monkeys, and pangolins. Tuan, a biologist and bear specialist, embarks on an expedition to these untouched regions of the park in search of bears. The most hunted animal here is the pangolin, sought after for its scales believed to have medicinal properties and its meat considered a delicacy. A small Vietnamese conservation organization fights for the survival of this species.

programme.title: Faroe Islands
programme.desc: The Faroe Islands in the North Atlantic, located in the middle of the Gulf Stream between Scotland and Iceland, are an archipelago of eighteen green volcanic islands where a unique culture has developed over the last thousand years. As direct descendants of the Vikings, the Faroese feel committed to their traditions and hold on to customs, without missing out on the advantages of the modern and globalised world - from archaic hunter and shepherd culture to contemporary art. With the highest birth rate in Europe and the lowest social inequality in the world, the just fifty thousand Faroese are a very special people living on one of the last natural paradises in Europe.

programme.title: mareTV: The white wilderness in Greenland's East
programme.desc: Fjords, glaciers and the highest mountains in the Arctic: East Greenland with its spectacular nature is one of the most sparsely populated regions on earth. The people here live in extreme isolation and depend on helicopter flights for their supplies. Despite harsh conditions, the inhabitants here lovingly maintain their traditions and enjoy their outdoor leisure time even at minus 20 degrees Celsius. The town of Tasiilaq is the "metropolis" with 4,000 inhabitants and offers a very special attraction: the only ski lift on the east coast. Thomas Mikaelsen, the lift attendant, is not to be envied for his job. The only 100 meter long lift comes from Switzerland and is already 20 years old. If Thomas gets the drag lift running at all, it often only lasts for an hour. Then the ski crazy's luck depends on his repair skills. The lift is the only frosty open-air pleasure. For Salo Kunuk his sled dogs are both pleasure and work. He is currently teaching his daughter Karla how to steer a dog sled, private driving lessons from her father, so to speak. Karla will need it, because in the eternal ice the sled is the only means of transportation.

programme.title: Magical Moors
programme.desc: Wide open heaths, windswept and barren in winter, are transformed into wonderful carpets of white, fluffy cotton grass in summer. Large bears and wolves roam alongside delicately fluttering butterflies, the bubbling calls of black grouse and the enchanting trills of the great snipe. Moors, bogs and wetlands can be found all over in Europe. Everyone has at least heard about this habitat but most know little about it. It is an ancient yet largely unknown set of landscapes that is full of enchanting surprises. On a warm spring day, poisonous adders emerge from hiding to perform their impressive mating dance. As dusk falls, snipe gather on traditional leks, leaping and singing to impress the opposite sex. And deep down in the boggy marshes, glittering emeralds of sticky dew lure insects into the deadly arms of meat-eating plants. Magical Moors captures the quiet beauty of a spectacular landscape, and its often elusive wildlife, in stunning detail.

programme.title: The Südheide
programme.desc: Forests and fields, moors and heathland, shepherds and sheep - these are the symbols of an ostensibly unspoilt landscape that has inspired poets and painters alike for centuries. The secret of the almost 500 km² nature reserve Naturpark Südheide lies in its diversity: the origins of its soil, geology and topography can be traced back to the ice age. But the region between Hamburg and Hannover is anything but unspoilt. For centuries, it was synonymous with heathland farmers and formed as a North German cultivated landscape. This documentary tells of an almost unknown region, which has been strongly influenced by mankind for centuries, yet still remains diverse in its nature. Nature filmmaker Günter Goldmann presents the Lüneburg Heath to us with impressive behavioural observations of quarrelling black grouse, badgers in their subterranean burrows, the clashing of young wild boar and crane fledglings, who seek protection in the warm plumage of their parents. Aerial views present the region from a lofty perspective, while extreme HD slow motion images of black grouse, wild boar and roe deer provide insights into the world of the animal inhabitants in the heart of Lower Saxony.

programme.title: 15th Meridian East
programme.desc: As contrasting as the landscapes of the 15th meridian east, so different are its animal inhabitants. What are the living conditions like in the heat of the Namibian Damaraland, in Lusatia or on the coast of Norway? Which challenges do elephants, whales or kingfishers have to master together with their companions from north to south?

programme.title: 15th Meridian East
programme.desc: Almost 11000 kilometres lie between the northernmost and southernmost point of the 15th meridian east. Here you will find extreme landscapes such as the shimmering heat of Africa or the eternal cold of northern Scandinavia. Five people from Spitsbergen, Namibia, Slovenia, Germany and Poland dedicate their lives to environmental protection.

programme.desc: Tyler and Monica head to Virginia Beach where they're tasked by celebrity chef Cliff Crooks to create the ultimate cheat meal for a local restaurateur. Armed with the power of their taste buds, the dynamic duo checks out the best places to eat, including Oishii Burger, Chick's Oyster Bar and Klassic Doughnuts, to build an off-the-charts meal of epic portions.

programme.title: Cheat Meal
programme.desc: Tyler and Monica dive back into Virginia Beach's vibrant food scene to build the ultimate cheat meal for George Culver, the food-loving force behind the popular @iheartfoodvb. From the tropical vibes at Moxy Virginia Beach to the game-filled hangouts at Beachside Social, and the delightful flavors of Oh Mochi, De Rican Chef, and Belvedere South, they pull out all the stops to craft a meal that's as unforgettable as it is indulgent!

programme.title: Cheat Meal

programme.title: Africa From Cape to Kruger

programme.desc: The journey begins. Andi and Chelsey introduce Mozambique from the luxury of a helicopter. In this episode the girls introduce two key conservationists who will re-join them later for epic ocean safaris. Welcome to Mozambique.

programme.title: Paradise De Praia
programme.desc: Having sailed and docked at Inhambane, the girls set their coordinates in the direction of Porcos Island where they will visit an isolated island tribe.

programme.title: Paradise De Praia
programme.desc: Tofu is a hotspot for surfers from around the world. Andi and Chelsey join up with pro surfer Davey van Zyl and learn to surf in one of Mozambique's best breaks. In this episode the girls discover the importance of local surfing culture.

programme.title: My Van Life
programme.desc: Meet Lisa, a former lawyer who escaped the rat race and moved into a campervan after the early death of her mother. Lisa embarks on a cross-country road trip, peeking inside homes on wheels, and connecting with the incredible community of nomads.

programme.title: My Van Life
programme.desc: A hurricane in the south forces Lisa to change direction. We meet southern Van Lifers living under the radar in a state where the lifestyle is judged harshly. Tragically, Lisa's story takes a heavy turn when she discovers that her father has died.

programme.title: My Van Life
programme.desc: A colourful graffiti artist in Austin shares her story of loss with Lisa and gives her a tarot reading. We travel to rural Texas to overnight with Jupiter: an outspoken, non-binary person of colour, living in their vintage RV while studying law.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkeys south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season. Here in the sunshine, well finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is - you could not ask for a better setting. Aivars Smaukstellis, the reigning world champion is defending his title, and two-time world champion Dainis Zageris is also here, but with a though competition, who will win?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We're here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you're in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they're going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they're all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let's see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We've got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan's Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: We're in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We've got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: All of Berry Bitty City is excitedly making their way through the berry batch in search of the elusive Wanderberry. It is to be the dessert at the BerryFest Feast. Everyone is milling about searching for it on their own when Blueberry points out that the rules say the BerryFest Princess is in charge of the search. The girls turn to her for direction and she points them where she thinks the berry might be.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.sub-title: Nothing To Fear But Berries Themselves
programme.desc: Overhearing Blueberry reading a story to the baby Berrykins about the scary Galumphalot, Orange is uncharacteristically shaken. She determines she doesn't want anything scary around her, just relaxation. But while the girls are having a hair-styling party at Lemon's salon, a malfunction at the BerryWorks causes the whole town to go dark. And Orange begins to get really anxious.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.sub-title: Where, Oh, Where Has Our Blueberry Gone?
programme.desc: Blueberry has become obsessed with the mystery book detective heroine, Patti Persimmon. She decorates her store with Patti posters and rearranges her shelves to make room for all the Patti books she's ordered. Blueberry begins to neglect outings with her friends and even goes so far as to dress like her idol just to emulate her. She then starts looking for cases to solve around town.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry, Cherry and the girls form a new band, Strawberry and the Sweet Beats, and prepare to go on the road to perform at the Opening Ceremony of the Berry Big City Games! While master mechanic Berrykin Bruce turns Cherry's tour bus into the band's hotel-on-wheels, Strawberry and her friends pack for the big trip. But the rest of Berry Bitty City points out that someone needs to run the girls' businesses while they are gone.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Blueberry is disappointed in the girls' lack of enthusiasm for the Patti Persimmon mystery novels, her favorite book series. She finds herself missing the company of her fellow Persimmon fan Huckleberry, and thinks up a great way to get him to visit. She invites Huck to co-write a story with her to submit to an online mystery magazine.. Huck eagerly accepts and comes for a visit.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Disappearing Dog Show
programme.desc: When Huckleberry and Blueberry's Patti Persimmon-style mystery story is rejected by an online mystery magazine, Blueberry and Huck have to come up with a new way to raise support for Huckleberry's Hotel for Homeless Pets back in Berry Big City. Strawberry suggests they hold a big dog show! Plum makes over-ambitious plans to display talents that her dog does not quite have, trying to teach him complicated dance routines.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The Baby Berrykins are enthralled by a fairytale that Blueberry reads to them for Story Time. Charmed by their reaction, Strawberry suggests that the girls do a "berrytale play" for the kids, sort of a "Story Time On Stage." Plum volunteers to direct it. She envisions a small, simple production-until she hears about a gigantic production of "Snowberry and the Seven Berrykins" that's a smash hit in Berry Big City.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry and the girls excitedly plan to put on a "Story Time On Stage" musical play for the Berrykin kids: "Berryella and Prince Berry Charming," directed and choreographed by Plum, with musical direction by Cherry. Strawberry will play Berryella, with Lemon and Blueberry as her comically jealous stepsisters, and costume designer Raspberry as her Fairy Fashionmother.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Orange wants to spend the day teaching her puppy to fetch, but the frisky little gal doesn't seem to understand the "retrieve" part of the activity-as soon as she gets the ball, she runs out of sight and returns moments later without it. Orange gets a new ball and tries again, with the same results. Over and over, until Orange is out of balls. Puzzled and frustrated that she can't find where her pup has stashed them, she goes to enlist her friends to help her search.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Cherry Jam is so enjoying staying in Berry Bitty City, that she calls her managers in Big Bitty City and informs them that she is going to stay for a much needed vacation! Strawberry and the girls are thrilled that she will be with them for a little longer, and they do all they can to make their guest comfortable. But Cherry doesn't want to be treated like a guest she wants to fit in and contribute to the community.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When Apple feels left out of a Berryball game and an advanced ballet class, she invents some "groove booties" programmed to dance to any beat. She temporarily impresses her friends with her dance moves, but when the groove booties go out of control and threaten the town's Berryball game, she is forced to fess up.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When the girls discover that Apple's groove booties can teach the pups to dance, Plum gets an idea for a Doggie Dance Show. Wanting to impress them, Huck offers to have TomTom join the show... despite the pup's obvious dislike of performing in public. It's up to Strawberry to help Huck see that he should not force TomTom into something he just doesn't want to do.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When a simple tune Cherry composes goes viral on the Berryweb, Cherry quickly gets fed up with everyone listening to this song, everywhere, all the time. She goes to comic lengths to get some peace so she can compose the song she's suppose to write for the Queen of Berryvania.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When Strawberry & her friends decide to put on a talent show, they plan to enter themselves as a band, The Strawberry Jams!

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: When Narwhal loses his horn, the source of his musical mojo, he switches jobs with Duck. Then, Howie discovers there's a night shift at the Banana Cabana, who have even more fun than the day shift!

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Howie attempts to 'go green'... but goes too far. Then, when garbage starts falling out of thin air, Howie and the gang try to figure out why!

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Bunny challenges irresponsible Howie to take care of a pineapple for a single afternoon. Then, Howie concocts a potion that turns him into an obnoxious (and hairy!) party animal.

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Howie tries to figure out a sneaky way to give nervous Narwhal a needle. Then, Octo and Batty compete to see who can be the most evil, evil minion.

programme.title: Almost Naked Animals
programme.desc: Poodle reluctantly agrees to be Howie's teammate in a siblings-only competition. Then, Howie's brilliant Banana Cabana coupon plan backfires when too many guests show up at once.

programme.title: The Bigger Picture
programme.desc: When the kids meddle in their teacher's dream to find test answers, they realize that in dreams, sweet little Ms. Putnam isn't so sweet... or little!

programme.title: Beasts And Dragons, Rise Of Garmadon
programme.desc: Zane, Jay, and Kai remember some of Ninjago's fearsome creatures so that Cole defend the cave from an unidentified monster. But Ninja confront memories of their greatest villain and ally, Garmadon, before the threat to Zane controls him completely.

programme.title: The Oni And The Dragon
programme.desc: While Princess Harumi learns to adjust to the life of a Ninja, Lloyd and Jay search for answers about the Oni Masks at Mystake's Tea house, while Cole and Zane attempt to infiltrate the Sons of Garmadon biker gang. Remembering that Lloyd managed to arrest one of the gang members at Borg Tower, the Ninja decide to interrogate him to ascertain the location of the third Oni Mask. In order to get him to talk, however, Cole suggests they visit MYSTAKE'S TEA HOUSE to obtain some "truth tea." The truth-tea backfires spectacularly when Cole accidentally switches cups and drinks the tea himself. Zane is able to salvage the situation, however, and obtains a lead. He learns that the Sons of Garmadon frequent a karaoke bar called LAUGHY'S. Zane and Cole don disguises to infiltrate the bar. Cole assumes the alter ego “Rocky Dangerbuff," while Zane adopts the subtler moniker "Snake Jaguar." In order to earn the gang's trust, Cole performs a karaoke routine that is a smash success. Unfortunately, during the routine, his disguise comes loose and he is exposed as a ninja. The Sons of Garmadon attack him, and Zane (who is still in disguise) is unable to intervene. Cole is taken prisoner while Zane is invited back to the Sons of Garmadon's secret base.

programme.title: The Pranks
programme.desc: The friends are using their talents to pull a prank on Olivia. But who gets the last laugh? Stephanie finds the perfect front page story for the school paper! It's almost too good to be true. Emma and Andrea go undercover to solve the mystery of the two Jacobs.

programme.title: Floss Dance
programme.desc: Learn the dance "The Floss" with LEGO Friends and experience the much more fun.

programme.title: Karoake and Music Special
programme.desc: LEGO Friends are having fun with Karaoke and music.

programme.title: Celebrating The Special Day
programme.desc: Here, the girls go on an adventurous balloon ride. Watch how much fun they have.

programme.title: Only One Can Remain
programme.desc: On the island, Lloyd learns that his father used to train under the deceitful Master Chen and when the Ninja meet the playfully deceitful ruler, they realize they are in a tournament where “Only one can remain.” On the island, Lloyd learns his father used to train under the deceitful Master Chen. They meet the playfully deceitful ruler who tells them they are in a tournament where ‘Only one can remain'. When they are spoiled by their posh quarters, they are surprised to find the game is already afoot: Last person to find a Jade Blade is out. After an epic battle of elemental powers, Kai steals the last one from Karlof, who is kicked out of the tournament through a trap door leading to the unknown. Later that night, the Ninja go in search for Zane but come across an underground temple where Chen and his Anacondrai Worshippers steal Karlof's power. Is this a fighting tournament, or a ploy to steal everyone's power?

programme.title: Versus
programme.desc: In order find Zane, the Ninja stay in the tournament to get past the first round but Chen complicates things by changing the bracket and pitting Jay against Cole. In order to find Zane and get to the bottom of Chen's mysterious plot the Ninja need to stay in the tournament and get past the first round. Chen complicates things by changing the bracket and pitting Jay against Cole. Meanwhile, new Titanium Ninja Zane is locked in a dungeon and has a nightmare about a ferocious Ice Dragon. Guided by the voice of Pixal, he embraces his new technology and escapes his cell, only to find Pixal hasn't fared as well. Though she has no body, he inputs her CPU into his, uniting the two. In an attempt to prevent Jay versus Cole, the Ninja enlist the Master of Mind to help, but are unable to prevent the inevitable. In a gladiator battle, Jay and Cole put aside their feud to throw the match --enraging Chen to send Cole down the mysterious trap door. Lastly, Nya sees Zane's beacon is working again and is on the hunt for them.

programme.title: Winds Of Change
programme.desc: Kai promises to watch over Lloyd when Lloyd fears the loss of his father will make the path ahead uncertain– but when Wu sends them out on an errand for his new Tea Farm, Lloyd goes on a solo mission... only to discover it's a trap from a GHOST who's escaped the Cursed Realm. After the Ninja save a small fishing village, Lloyd fears the loss of his father will make the path ahead uncertain but Kai promises to watch over him. When Wu sends them out on an errand for his new Tea Farm, Lloyd goes on a solo mission... only it's a trap from a GHOST who's escaped the Cursed Realm. When the Ninja's powers mysteriously disappear, they return to the Tea Farm and are attacked by Lloyd, who is possessed by the spirit of Moro, the Master of Wind! After a harrowing escape on the Bounty, Wu tells the Ninja they weren't his first pupils!

programme.title: Ghost Story
programme.desc: When Moro gives chase to the Bounty and steals Wu's staff, Wu shares the story of Moro: the boy who wanted to be the Green Ninja – and the Ninja discover Wu's staff contained 3 symbols that lead to the Tomb of the First Spinjitzu Master which holds a mysterious relic that could alter the course of Ninjago. Moro gives chase to the Bounty and steals Wu's staff, leaving them to crash. When the dust settles, Wu shares the story of Moro: the boy who wanted to be the Green Ninja. They discover Wu's staff contained 3 symbols that lead to the Tomb of the First Spinjitzu Master which holds a mysterious relic that could alter the course of Ninjago. In order to save Lloyd and get their powers back, they set off to find the first clue – the scroll to the lost martial art of ‘Airjitzu'. On their way to get it, they have a run in with one of Moro's ghost generals Wraythe, and discover water is the key to stopping them. Meanwhile, Nya discovers a family secret – her mother was a Water Ninja and with training, she could be one too.

programme.title: Saturday Knight Fever
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters catching a cold means trouble for the NEXO-Knights when he can create an entirely new kind of “snotty” monster. King and Queen Halbert have journeyed to the town of Cleanington to open the brand new Scrubbery Barn at the invitation of Roger the Scrubber (seen in 104.) Meanwhile, the Book of Monsters drags Jestro to Snottingham – one of the coldest places in Knighton where everyone coughs, has a runny nose and is generally under-the-weather. The BOM demands that Jestro feed him a “snotheiser” ball which will probably make him sick. The BOM explains that if he is sick, he may just produce a whole new breed of magical monsters … some that the knights would NEVER expect. The BOM gets sick and starts coughing up phlegm globlins and bloblins. The Knights arrive, alerted to what they think is an attack on the town by Snottingham's mayor, Hack Coughmeier. The sickened, sneezy, snotty monsters infect the knights and, more importantly, the knights' NEXO-Shields. Now their NEXO-Powers are infected. As they try to download something to fight the monsters, they realize the powers they get are off strange, infected versions of their powers. The knights drive Jestro and his snot monsters off and they turn in for the night. And, overnight, they all get sick. Meanwhile, the BOM order a nice, hot lava bath…he'll feel fine by morning. But the knights wake-up with colds and they feel terrible. Ava and Merlok 2.0 thinks it will pass in a day or two…it's just a typical Snottingham cold. Each knight gets sick in their own funny way and their illnesses play right into Jestro and the BOM's hands: they're headed to Cleanington to kidnap the king! The citizens of the ultra-clean city hate the sight of monsters, but then feel caught in between when the sick, sneezy, snotty knights arrive on their Fortrex. The fight goes terribly for the knights. They try to download the Nexo-power “Glorious Griffon” but instead get just feathers. So they improvise and tickle the monsters! Ava finally comes up with a way to use some anti-virus tools on their NEXO-Shields and just as Jestro is about to take the king and queen away, the NEXO-Knights get their normal powers back! They defeat Jestro and save the king and queen.

programme.title: Open Mike Knight
programme.desc: The Book of Betrayal leads Jestro and his Monsters to Funnyton – the funnies town in the kingdom. When they Knights arrive to capture him, they discover (to their shock) that Jestro and the Book of Monsters are now the town's top comedians! Jestro and his monsters are in attack formation moving to pillage the town of Funnyton. But when they arrive, ready to tear into the place, they see that nobody's in town. Then, they hear…laughter?! The entire town is there listening to a stand-up comic JOKES KNIGHTLY. He's hilarious. He commands such power, such attention, and such loyalty. Jestro and the BOM decide they must become funny. They order all kinds of book on comedy from Spamazon: books on parody, irony, insult humor, slapstick, satire, knock-knock jokes, elephant jokes, “my monster is so fat” jokes, etc. They work-up a ventriloquist act with the BOM sitting on Jestro's lap. They start doing their act and, surprisingly, they're funny. They're very funny. The Fortrex arrives and the knights rush out, ready for battle. They fight through a string of monsters just outside the town, but discover they're only working as “bouncers” to keep too many people out of the comedy club. (“Sorry, you guys aren't on the list.”) The knights hear loud laughs and head there. In the club, they discover the town isn't being held hostage, they're in the show voluntarily having a great time. And…Jestro and the BOM are funny. Meanwhile, during the show, Jokes Knightly decides he'll steal the BOM and Jestro's act. During the intermission at the comedy show, Clay comes backstage to talk to Jestro. Maybe, Clay says, this shows that Jestro doesn't have to be bad…he is funny, like Clay always said he was. Meanwhile, Jokes Knightly steals the BOM and Jestro can't find it. He panics. Clay encourages him…go on stage alone, be funny…he can do it! Jestro goes out and is funny on his own he hits all his punchlines, he gets big laughs he starts to see that Clay is right. The BOM sees that Jokes Knightly has a “joke book” that turns out to be the BOOK OF BETRAYAL. That's how Mike Knight has become so funny – by stealing everyone's material! BOM calls in Magmar, who saves him from Mike Knight AND takes the Book of Betrayal. As Jestro comes off-stage to great applause, the BOM tells him they have the Book of Betrayal. The BOM calls in Magmar and his monsters and they start a fight as Clay comes to Jestro's defense and calls on the other Knights for backup. A big battle ensues that destroys the comedy club in Funnyton. The Knights win and drive-off Magmar, the monsters and the BOM. As they retreat, the BOM looks around: “Where's my Jestro?!” Jestro sneaked away during the fight and is in a nearby forest with…the Book of Betrayal.

programme.title: The Fortrex And The Furious
programme.desc: In a massive chase around Knighton, the NEXO-Knights attempt to keep the Book of Betrayal out of the Book of Monster's grip. But the evil book is persistent. Will he get the final piece of his evil puzzle? We finally REVEAL that Jestro has given the Book of Betrayal to…Clay. He tells Clay what it is and how Mike Knight used it. And it seems that the Book of Monsters believed it to be the final ingredient in some ‘Master Plan.” Suddenly, they realize Monsters – led by Magmar and the super-mad Book of Monster – are after them! Clay retreats with Jestro and the Book of Betrayal to rendezvous with the other Knights at the Fortrex. The Fortrex isn't fast enough they'll need their own vehicles. They decide that they need to split up and go in multiple directions to make the monsters expend their resources on a chase. It's a huge chase, being covered like a crazy news event by the Knighton News Network. We see a montage of the monsters stopping and capturing all the Knights vehicles: Aaron, Macy, Lance…finally Axl. However, as they do, they realize that the Knights have used Squirebots in Jestro Fan Jester hats (from the vendor at the comedy club in 108) as decoys. They think Axl has the Book of Betrayal in his BRICK containment unit, but it turns out to be the Ned Knightly Comic from episode 203. The Monsters finally corner Clay, who has the real Jestro and Book of Betrayal in his sword vehicle. Before Clay can protest, Jestro pushes the launch button and fires off Clay in the vehicle's rocket sword. The monsters race off with Jestro, leaving the shocked Clay fearing for his friend. Now, Magmar tells the Book of Monsters, they only need to get BOB. Clay makes his way back to the Fortrex and tells what has happened. They decide they must get to the Redoubt of Ruination in the Lava Lands and try to save Jestro. Meanwhile, we see, INTERCUT, a scene where Merlok 2.0 and the Book of Monsters explain the Books of Evil, how they were created and what the BOM will use them for. Merlok, back in the day, split the evil MONSTRUX into 10 magic books to keep him from ever being a threat. Only, he didn't destroy the books…and now the BOM has them and Monstrux can come back into the world! Meanwhile, the BOM has set up the huge, ceremonial arena at their HQ so they can have the ceremony to bring Monstrux back into the world. Jestro realizes he's been a pawn of the Book of Monsters. Jestro says he'll never get the Book of Betrayal…the Knights have it. In the last scene, we see Clay taking the Book of Betrayal from the Fortrex, climbing into his vehicle and driving towards…the Redoubt of Ruination! Has the Book of Betrayal worked its evil magic on him?!

programme.title: Kingdom Of Heroes
programme.desc: The Book of Monsters, having the final pieces of his evil plan in place, tries to take human form. Can the NEXO-Knights and Merlok 2.0 stop the greatest threat they've ever faced? Or will the kingdom be plunged into darkness…forever. The Redoubt of Ruination readies the final ceremony to call forth MONSTRUX, the arch-necromancer of the past. Clay, holding the Book of Betrayal walks to the gates of the spooky place. Inside, Clay hears strange…singing and music. It's like a twisted Broadway show of some kind. Meanwhile, the Knights all realize Clay is gone and so is the Book of Betrayal. Macy says Clay must be up to something. They have to trust him and, more importantly, they have to find him. At the Redoubt of Ruination the ceremony has already begun! The Book of Monsters wants the final ceremony that calls forth Monstrux to be like a really great show! The BOM then barfs up all the BOOKS OF EVIL into their places around Jestro. He's just missing the BOOK OF BETRAYAL, which Clay has. Clay says he'll trade the book for Jestro. The BOM immediately agrees to the deal and sets Jestro free. Then, Monsters grab-up Clay, restrain him, and put him in Jestro's place on the sacrifice stone. From outside, they're interrupted by the sounds of battle the Knights have arrived on the Fortrex and are attacking the Redoubt of Ruination. In the confusion, Jestro slips away. The BOM lets loose with a powerful protection spell to keep the Knights out as he starts with the ceremony…he's going to bring Monstrux out and remanifest him in Clay's body! Jestro is able to escape the Redoubt and make his way to the Knights, who can't seem to battle their way in. It's a race against time as the Knights try to get in and save Clay. As the Knights get in, they see that the crazy BOM is absorbing all the Books of Evil, one-by-one. He grows BIGGER and BIGGER! Macy calls for NEXO-Power…but it's not enough! The gigantic Book of Monsters sucks down the final book, the Book of Betrayal! He looms over Clay, about to consume him, too, and make him into Monstrux! Suddenly, Robin appears carrying TECHKALIBER…he tosses it to Clay. Just as the huge Book of Monsters falls on Clay, he holds up Techkaliber and Merlok 2.0 is there…his full power in the sword. Clay sticks the sword into the Book of Monster's huge mouth. BOOM! There's a BIG, MAGICAL EXPLOSION! As we cut back inside, we see the Book of Monsters is gone. The Knights release Clay and he thanks them and Jestro for saving him. Jestro thanks them all for saving him and seeing the good in him. WE DISSOLVE TO: The JoustDome. In a final ceremony the King and Queen reward the knights and congratulate them for keeping the kingdom safe. There are speeches, happiness and friendship. And Jestro even does a bit that's funny. At the very end we see a hint of something…Monstrux and the Book of Monsters are still out there.

programme.title: The Answer Smurf
programme.desc: Nobody ever listens to Brainy Smurf's advice, and when Papa Smurf is away and Brainy feels he's in charge, he decides he's going to be the one with all the answers. There is a magic formula in Papa Smurf's Book of Spells that ensures everyone in the Village of the Smurfs is going to ask for Brain's opinion. As if matters weren't difficult enough, here's Gargamel...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfic Games: The Smurfs discover the spirit and joy of friendly competition when they hold their first "Smurfic Games". After a near miss with the troublesome cat Azrael, the Smurfs decide they need to get into better shape. Papa Smurf suggests that the Smurfs tone their bodies as well as sharpen their athletic abilities by inaugurating the "Smurfic Games".

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Dancing Shoes: An evil imp gives Smurfette dancing shoes and then tricks her into promising to marry him. All her little friends rush to her rescue and Papa Smurf magically puts the dancing shoes on the imp. He is forced to dance off into the night.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All's Smurfy That Ends Smurfy: Gargamel's theft of the Fairies' gold almost brings a state of war between the Fairies and the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Crooner Smurf: Harmony Smurf is no longer wanted in the Smurf Choir: his singing is too far off-key. But Papa Smurf gives him an amulet that will make him a vocal virtuoso. Now here comes Hogatha...

programme.title: The Smurfiest Of Friends
programme.desc: Brainy Smurf had one friend: Clumsy Smurf. But poor Clumsy is so, well, clumsy, that Brainy refuses to see him again. So now he is left without anyone willing to listen to him. Maybe Buddy, the good-looking imp met by chance near the Great Oak can be a pal for Brainy....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Float Full Of Smurfs: The Smurfs must find a bunny family to pull their float in the Autumn Carnival. Gargamel sees his chance to capture the little blue people and disguises himself as a giant bunny. Is he going to catch all the Smurfs in one fell swoop?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Traveller: A dragon terrorizes the Village of the Smurfs. To put the dragon to rest, the Smurfs must find the noted Chinese traveler. Fortunately, Papa Smurf is able to understand the strange customs of the stranger, and even to speak a few words.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Forget-Me-Smurfs: Little Sickly turns into a hero when he forgets his ailments and saves the rest of the Smurfs from the deadly forget-me flowers.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Prince And The Hopper: What is that strange talking frog that Morlock the Wizard sends all of Prince Theodore's soldiers to catch? Is it a demon frog, as he says, or something else? Truth will out when Smurfette and the Smurflings meet the frog. They help to change this frog back into Prince Theodore himself, for he's been the victim of a spell cast by Morlock.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tis The Season To Be Smurfy: This is Wild Smurf's first Christmas, and he's impressed by the decorations in the Village of the Smurfs. But Grandpa and Sassette are going to teach him the real meaning of Christmas when they help an old couple to live the most beautiful Christmas they've ever seen...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hopping Cough Smurfs: The evil wizard Gargamel spreads the forest with the germs of the uncontrollable hopping cough. Baby Smurf is the first victim and all the Village of the Smurfs goes frantic with worry... Fortunately, Papa Smurf thinks there might be a cure.

programme.title: Gormandizing Greedy
programme.desc: Greedy overdoes it. He's getting heavier and heavier until his weight puts him in jeopardy. The evil Gargamel is going to catch him... Can Greedy be saved by Papa Smurf?

programme.title: Dreamy's Pen Pals
programme.desc: When Dreamy decides to visit his friends, the Swoofs, Papa develops a potion to turn the Smurfs into alien-like creatures. But when the potion wears off to soon, Dreamy has to face the reality that the Swoofs do not exist. He is sad until a real alien arrives, returning Dreamy's letter that was delivered by mistake.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Supersmurf: Bigmouth steals the Smurfs' winter food supply and Brainy concocts one of Papa Smurf's magic strength potions so he can fight the greedy giant. The super formula wears off, but Papa Smurf works a fast switch, replacing the food with rocks and Bigmouth is none the wiser.

programme.title: Clumsy Luck
programme.desc: The Smurfs learn about superstition when Clumsy breaks Vanity's mirror prior to a meteor shower. When a meteor falls on Clumsy's house, everyone attributes it to bad luck, but realize the foolishness of this philosophy when they see Clumsy was not in the house at the time.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sideshow Smurfs: Clumsy and Smurfette are captured by the wicked Bombast, who plans to exhibit them in his sideshow. Papa Smurf hurries to their rescue and using the bungling Gargamel for interference is able to rescue his Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Little Orange Horse With Gold Shoes: Sliding down a rainbow, a little winged horse loses a golden shoe. He meets the Smurfette and she helps him look for his lost horseshoe. They fall in love somehow, for who could be unmoved by the charm of a little orange horse... Or of a Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Every Picture Smurfs A Story: The evil Maestro's magical paints have the power to transport his models onto canvas – forever! Papa Smurf directs Painter to switch his paints and before long, Maestro is enshrined in a picture next to his dream girl, Smurfette.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After Walter takes up origami as a martial art, Dennis scoffs and comes up with his own martial art, and so the two prepare to battle it out. Followed by 'Smelling of Roses'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After watching a film about an alien invasion, Dennis, Curly and Pie Face decide to make their own film. However, Walter stumbles across them filming, and he only sees the action, not the camera. Filming what he sees on his mobile phone, he runs to tell the whole of Beanotown about the alien invasion. As panic spreads, Dennis and his friends discover the chaos and decide to keep filming in order to help make the best of their own alien film. Meanwhile, Sergeant Slipper investigates the alien landing that Walter has seen, and discovers the truth—that the spaceship is a playhouse with glow sticks in it. Followed by 'Castle in the Air'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis and his pet dog, Gnasher, live by just one rule: Kids should make all the rules! Followed by Dance of the Seven Pies.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 'Fish Tale'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: For a school project, Dennis and Walter both build robots. However, during an accident, both robots merge, causing Dennis and Walter to defend the school. Followed by 'No Joke.'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: With one backstage pass for a Ratbucket gig, Dennis and his friends pass themselves off as Ratbucket, only for the real Ratbucket not to be able to play at his own concert. Followed by 60 second Dennis and 'Bad Dad'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: After Dennis breaks his bike, Dad is unable to afford a new one, so Dennis convinces him to ask his boss for a raise. Unfortunately, Mr Scrimp reduces his wages instead. Dennis then trashes his house to convince Scrimp that his family are poor, so that Mr Scrimp will feel compelled to raise Dad's wages. Just as Scrimp has been taken in by Dennis' plan, Mum and Dad arrive home laden with shopping bags, resulting in Dad getting fired on the spot. Dennis resolves to get Dad his old job back by secretly causing chaos at his office. To restore order Scrimp rehires Dad, sealing the deal with a generous pay rise. Mum and Dad repair the house, but still don't have enough money to buy Dennis a new bike, instead it gets repaired with Dad's office rubber bands and paperclips. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dennis Hiccups'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher

programme.desc: Mum has bought curtain material for the soon to be newly decorated kitchen, and asks Dad to look after it while she is out. However, Dad falls asleep and mistakenly agrees that Dennis can use it as a giant sail. When Dad realises that it has gone, he calls Dennis to bring it back, but unfortunately Dennis gets into a spot of bother with the colonel, who takes the curtain material off Dennis. In an attempt to steal it back, the garden being wrecked and the kitchen is left looking like a bombsite. Dennis, Gnasher and Dad have to clean up the whole kitchen and redecorate it in time for Mum returning. When Mum decides it is time to hang the new curtains, Dennis is about to get the curtain material, but Mum reveals that she has changed her mind and bought new curtains instead. Followed by 'Fangs for the Memories'

programme.title: The Hustle
programme.desc: Josephine Chesterfield (Anne Hathaway) is a glamorous, seductive Brit with a penchant for defrauding gullible wealthy men. Into her well-ordered world bursts Penny Rust (Rebel Wilson), an Aussie who is as free-form and fun-loving as Josephine is calculated and cunning.

programme.title: Dan In Real Life
programme.desc: In this down-to-earth dramedy, a widowed advice columnist and single father (Steve Carell) falls in love with a woman (Juliette Binoche) only to discover she is dating his brother.

programme.title: Lies and Deception
programme.desc: (2005) Thriller with Twin Peaks star Mädchen Amick. A private investigator helps a women discover the truth about her husband's apparent suicide.

programme.title: Live Once , Die Twice
programme.desc: (2006) Thriller starring Kellie Martin. A widow discovers her husband faked his death - and had another wife. Now, both women team up to uncover the truth about their heinous hubby's betrayal.

programme.title: Bad Man's River
programme.desc: (1971) Comedy western with Lee Van Cleef and James Mason. It's a wild ride of bank robbing, wife swapping and double crossing as two rivals team up to steal a million bucks from the government.

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: In the brutal World War II Battle of Saipan, Sergeant Joe Enders (Nicolas Cage) guards -- and befriends -- Ben Yahzee (Adam Beach), a young Navajo trained in the one wartime code never broken by the enemy... the Navajo Code.

programme.title: The Cat's Meow
programme.desc: In 1924, media mogul William Randolph Hearst gathered some of the world's best known personalities for a trip of his yacht that resulted in a still-unsolved, hushed-up murder.

programme.title: Louder Than Words
programme.desc: After the unexpected death of their daughter, a couple work to build a state of the art children's hospital where families are welcomed into the healing process.

programme.title: There Be Dragons
programme.desc: Two childhood friends become separated by the political turmoil of pre-war Spain only to find themselves on opposite sides when the war erupts. One becomes a priest, the other is an activist who becomes a spy for the fascist movement. As the battles are waged, the characters' lives collide...

programme.title: The Dating List
programme.desc: Abby Morel is a bright, young editor's assistant living in the big city. Wanting to get ahead in her career, she makes an unusual deal with her high-flying boss, Susan. Susan is far too busy to date, but she wants to fall in love. Abby agrees to ‘screen' dates in exchange for a promotion, and to add to the pressure, Susan is looking for the perfect man! After a couple of disasters, Abby meets Dan, who seemingly ticks all the boxes. The trouble is, she's starting to fall for him too… A promising career now within her reach, will she risk losing it all for true love?

programme.title: Sincerely, Yours, Truly
programme.desc: Hayley stumbles upon a bundle of letters with an engagement ring from a mysterious sender, she decides to respond to him with her own alias, and with it start the anonymous correspondence that will change her life forever.

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: Compromised by his affair with the first lady, a veteran secret service agent is framed as a potential presidential assassin and must rely on a hostile former prot‚g‚ to flush out the real culprit.

programme.title: Cybermutt
programme.desc: The powerful dog Rex is injured by a car while rescuing a young scientist from being run over. Feeling responsible for the condition of Rex the scientist uses his skill as a prosthetics inventor to give the dog a new, super-power body.

programme.title: Love and Honor
programme.desc: While fighting in Vietnam, Dalton hears his girlfriend has dumped him so decides to fly to get her back. AWOL from the war zone, he has seven days to get back to the US, change his girlfriend's mind and make it back to Vietnam without anyone noticing

programme.title: Benji
programme.desc: Two school kids strike up a friendship with an orphaned puppy named Benji. When danger befalls them and they end up kidnapped by robbers who are in over their heads, Benji and his scruffy sidekick come to the rescue.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: In order to protect a woman from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as an elderly woman.

programme.title: Walk Among the Tombstones
programme.desc: Private investigator Matthew Scudder is hired by a drug lord to find out who kidnapped and murdered his wife.

programme.title: The Son of No One
programme.desc: A cop is assigned to the neighborhood where he grew up, where an old secret threatens to destroy his family.

programme.title: Beyond Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: The Sheriff of Nottingham unleashes a monster to massacre Robin Hood's men and capture Maid Marian.

programme.title: Three Musketeers
programme.desc: The disbanded Musketeers reunite to defeat a beautiful double agent and the scheming man she is working for.

programme.title: The Flowers of War
programme.desc: In 1937, as the invading Japanese Imperial Army overruns China's capital city, desperate civilians seek refuge behind the protective walls of a western cathedral. Here, John Miller (Christian Bale), an American is barricaded with a group of schoolgirls and thirteen courtesans. With nowhere to run and nowhere to hide, fate always has a way of bringing the most unlikely heroes together.

programme.title: Cold Brook
programme.desc: One fateful evening, after working late hours at the museum, two maintenance workers see a man standing silently near a Civil War exhibit. Despite chasing him away, each night he returns. Soon Ted and George learn that no one else can see the mysterious figure dressed in centuries-old clothing his name is Gil Le Doux and he's searching for a way home.

programme.title: Henry V
programme.desc: King Henry V of England is insulted by the King of France. As a result, he leads his army into battle against France. Along the way, the young king must struggle with the sinking morale of his troops and his own inner doubts. The war culminates at the bloody Battle of Agincourt.

programme.title: A Single Man
programme.desc: An adaptation based on a novel by Christopher Isherwood, A Single Man is a romantic tale of love interrupted, the isolation that is an inherent part of the human condition, and ultimately the importance of the seemingly smaller moments in life. Set in Los Angeles in 1962, at the height of the Cuban missile crisis, A Single Man, tells the story of a British college professor (Colin Firth) who dwells on the past and cannot see his future. We follow him through a single day, where a series of events and encounters, ultimately leads him to decide if there is a meaning to life after the death of his long time partner, Jim (Matthew Goode, Watchmen).

programme.title: Haunt
programme.desc: A terrifying and engaging, possession horror about a family who have recently moved into a cursed house, which had caused the death of the previous family to occupy it. A frightening and powerful character-driven haunted-house horror, starring Jacki Weaver (Silver Linings Playbook), Harrison Gilbertson (Need for Speed) and Liana Liberato (The Best of Me).

programme.title: Mara
programme.desc: A twisted, spine-tingling horror based on the ancient legend of the night hag demon - Mara. Criminal psychologist Kate (Olga Kurylenko: Quantum of Solace) is assigned to the murder of a man who has seemingly been strangled in his sleep by his wife and the only witness is their daughter. As Kate investigates she experiences the same petrifying symptoms and spirals through a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: Bad Parents
programme.desc: Let the battle commence in Bad Parents, a hilarious, comedic look into the manic world of football and overzealous parents! Suburban mother Kathy (Janeane Garofalo: Ratatouille) is thrust into the hyper-competitive world of football when she signs up her 7-year-old daughter for a team with a mass of crazy parents involved. The game is on in this hysterical comedy. An absolute must watch!

programme.title: Bauhaus Spirit
programme.desc: Almost a hundred years ago, a radical artistic utopia was born in the city of Weimar Bauhaus. This is a fascinating look at how it still shapes our world today. Against the background of the 100th anniversary 'Bauhaus Spirit: 100 Years of Bauhaus' not only tells art history, but also contemporary history. Bauhaus made art, design and architecture political. The result was a spatial art form that wasn't above thinking about the distance between a bathtub and a toilet or the ideal chair. We go back to the beginning and celebrate the cultural history of modern spatial thinking that is as captivating as it is enlightening.

programme.title: Ruth and Alex
programme.desc: Hollywood heavyweights Morgan Freeman (Driving Miss Daisy) and Diane Keaton (Manhattan) unite to redefine the term coming of age in this heart-warming story about life, love and real estate! When a couple opts to put their apartment on the market over one crazy weekend, they discover that finding a new place is not about winding down but starting a whole new adventure!

programme.title: Home For Harvest
programme.desc: (2019) Charming romance with Brigitte Kingsley. A writer is assigned to cover a story in the town she left, heartbroken, years ago - only to find herself torn between her ex and a new man in town...

programme.title: Farmer Seeking Love
programme.desc: (2021) Barnyard beau-mance with Jesse Hutch. A TV producer tries to convince a handsome farmer to join a reality dating show to harvest better ratings, but finding romance is no walk in the cornfield.

programme.title: Sweet As Maple Syrup
programme.desc: (2021) Romantic comedy starring Brooke Nevin. Rachelle teams up with a charming professor to save her family's maple orchard ahead of a maple syrup festival - but will they end up stuck on each other?

programme.title: Wedding of Dreams
programme.desc: (2018) Romance with Debbie Gibson. Debbie loves her new life with Noah, mentoring young musicians. But when there's a chance to revive her pop career, will she give it all up?

programme.title: Listen Out for Love
programme.desc: Peyton Pepper, a goal-driven podcast producer, is forced to mold Alex McKinney, a brash loose cannon, into her next star and create the perfect show to save both of their careers. That show comes in the form of finding Peyton's iconic idol, true love.

programme.desc: When Seattle interior designer Lily Summers returns to her hometown to help her Aunt Maggie run her marina-side bed and breakfast, she meets Marcus, the handsome seaplane pilot whose life's work delivering rescue dogs helps Lily discover that home really is where the heart is.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Once upon a time, screenwriter Keith Michaels was on top of the world. But now, he's divorced, broke and hasn't written a hit film in years. His attitude slowly begins to turn when he meets Holly, a single mum.

programme.title: 12 Days of Giving
programme.desc: When Baxter decides to become a Secret Santa to the people in his hometown and the joy of giving at Christmas spreads across town. Along the way, he forms a close friendship with Pamela and her son Westin. But there's one problem, he's already engaged!

programme.title: You Can't Fight Christmas
programme.desc: Interior designer Leslie Major loves all things Christmas. When she meets handsome Edmund James, she quickly learns he thinks the festivities are frivolous and superficial.

programme.title: Law of Attraction
programme.desc: A young female attorney with ambition to make partner in her law firm, falls for an opposing attorney on a big important case. Will love prevail?

programme.title: Fixing Up Christmas
programme.desc: Known as a “fixer” for difficult clients, a talented party planner must help a young CEO plan the Christmas party of the year to dazzle the mayor and save his company. Wil the "fixer" fix something more than just the company?

programme.title: The Christmas Cure
programme.desc: When Vanessa returns home for Christmas, her name comes up for a huge promotion back at work! She is torn between taking the job or staying home to take over the family clinic, while her visit has rekindled an old romance as well.

programme.title: Belle and the Beast
programme.desc: Eric Landry is a cold-hearted man that people have nicknamed "the Beast." Years of anger and bitterness have consumed him, turning him into a selfish man. But Belle Watson is the exact opposite. When her father accidentally breaks a valuable work of art at the Landry mansion, Belles agrees to work for Eric in an effort to repay him and save her father's job. She discovers there just might be more to Eric. Will she find the man within the Beast?

programme.title: Surviving Love
programme.desc: Jessica Miller is thrust into the "real" world when she graduates from college. To conquer this new world, she must discover her faith, open a box of memories and learn the simple secrets of life only a mother can share.

programme.title: Ruling of the Heart
programme.desc: Judge Morgan has become known for his no-nonsense toughness in court. He rules fast and he rules hard, barely noticing the person on the other end of his decisions. When he gets stuck in a cafe during a snowstorm, he is surprised to discover two of the other customers stranded with him happen to be people recently in his court, with verdicts handed down that have made him very unpopular. As the night unfolds in the small cafe, unexpected truth emerges from both sides that changes everything.

programme.title: Off The Menu
programme.desc: An unlikely heir to a Mexican fast-food franchise goes ‘cuisine' hunting for the next culinary big thing he can ‘borrow,' and finds himself in a small, dusty New Mexican town where people come from all over to salivate over the culinary treats of a local female chef.

programme.title: Jennifer/Sampson/Norina
programme.desc: Jennifer, a young lawyer, must use all of her instincts.

programme.title: The Choking Game
programme.desc: Taryn, dubbed 'breath sister', hides Choking Game secret.

programme.title: The Bling Ring
programme.desc: Zack, Natalie and others begin breaking into the homes of celebrities.

programme.title: The Wrong Crush
programme.desc: High school track star, Amelia, is running from a troubled past.

programme.title: Jennifer/Sampson/Norina
programme.desc: Jennifer, a young lawyer, must use all of her instincts.

programme.title: Maria My Love
programme.desc: A young woman named Ana is struggling to deal with her mother's death and her father's mistakes. In an effort to feel better, she reconnects with her half-sister Grace, (Lauren Fales) and, inspired by a new boyfriend (Brian Rieger), sets out on a quest to find someone to help. Though excited and hopeful when she meets an eccentric woman named Maria (Karen Black), she soon discovers Maria is a compulsive hoarder, and is swept up in a situation more emotionally and morally complicated than she had expected to find. Inspired by a true story.

programme.title: Killer Caregiver
programme.desc: After a woman is wounded in an accident, a young and attractive live-in caregiver moves into her home where strange and dangerous events unfold until the woman discovers her caregiver is hell-bent on destroying her life.

programme.title: Love You to Death
programme.desc: A prosecutor must work on a case which reminds her of her childhood, when her mother was killed by her alcoholic father.

programme.title: Sister's Obsession, A
programme.desc: After Kendra's happy life starts to unravel, she soon discovers the cause is a vengeful long-lost twin sister.

programme.title: City Slickers II
programme.desc: Three urban adventurers return to the West and saddle up again, this time to search for hidden treasure.

programme.title: Are We There Yet? (2005)
programme.desc: Ice Cube plays Nick, a playboy bachelor and sports memorabilia collector who dates a divorced mother of two young kids who never like the men their mom dates. Things go awry when Nick offers to drive the kids from Portland to Vancouver where their mother is stuck for work.

programme.title: Are We Done Yet?
programme.desc: Now married to Suzanne, Nick Persons has bought a quiet suburban house to escape the rat race of the big city and to provide more space for his new wife and kids Lindsey and Kevin. But when his new home quickly becomes a costly "fixer upper" and he finds himself at the mercy of an eccentric contractor, Nick's suburban dream becomes a riotous nightmare.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: From the guys who brought you PAUL BLART: MALL COP, five high school pals reunite after 30 years at a July 4th celebration and wrestle with the challenges of adulthood.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother is pitted against brother in this tale of feuding ranchers in the Old West.

programme.title: For a Book of Dollars
programme.desc: A bounty hunter named Amen is hired by a group of nuns to recover stolen money. However, the nuns turn out to be female desperadoes in disguise, plotting to retrieve the booty pillaged by the ruthless outlaw Catapult and his gang. Amen must navigate a world of deception, danger, and betrayal to complete the job.

programme.title: Guns Of The Revolution
programme.desc: In Mexico, a mad general is leading his own war against the Church.

programme.title: Buckskin Frontier
programme.desc: A railroad man and the owner of a freight line battle for control of a crucial mountain pass.

programme.title: Murieta!
programme.desc: The story of Joaquin Murrieta, a real life Mexican bandit who terrorized California with his gang of raiders and cutthroats during the first half of the 19th century. Some saw him as a murderous outlaw, others as the Mexican Robin Hood.

programme.title: All Over the Town
programme.desc: Nat, a former RAF member, returns to his seaside home only to find his job at the local paper has been taken by a woman named Sally.

programme.title: Vote for Huggett
programme.desc: Comedy film of Huggett's plans to make a lido as a war memorial and the skullduggery that nearly wrecks his chances of election as a borough councillor.

programme.title: Climbing High
programme.desc: Diana gets a job in a modelling agency where she meets a wealthy young man, Nicky. Diana's brother is determined that Nicky will marry his sister and the trio set off on a climbing trip together. Will all be resolved?

programme.title: Simon and Laura
programme.desc: A TV studio hits upon an idea for a new programme - an hour-long show five days a week showing the trials and tribulations of the life of a married couple.

programme.title: Here Come the Huggetts
programme.desc: The first of a famous series of British family films revolving around a Royal Wedding. The film deals with the ordinary happenings of a typical middle-class household.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A talented but obese girl, who ghost-sings for a not-so-talented pop star, undergoes extensive plastic surgery to become a slender beauty with a new identity.

programme.title: The Fox Family
programme.desc: A story of a family who are kumiho(nine-tailed) foxes in human form. They are looking for a chance to eat a fresh human liver to be turned back into humans.

programme.title: BAIT
programme.desc: After the encounter, Joo-young can't stand Hyuk-soo anymore as he even threatens her students. To Joo-young, Korea's first Olympic gold medalist in women's curling and the skip (captain) of the team, the Olympic medal was everything. Living as a high school curling teacher, she accidentally meets Hyuk-soo, the coach related to her teammate's suicide. She decides to disclose who he really is and starts a new plan with a helper…She quits curling with a sense of responsibility and guilt after her teammate's suicide.

programme.title: Last Sentinel
programme.desc: Set in the future on a war-ravaged Earth, four soldiers man Sentinel – a remote military base in a vast ocean that separates two warring continents. They await the relief or the enemy, whichever comes first.

programme.title: Edge of War
programme.desc: A series of incidents around the world lead to greater conflict, placing the superpowers at one another's throats. Armies march, bombs rain down, soldiers storm the beaches. One family is caught up in the conflict, can they survive as total war is declared and nuclear weapons are unleashed?

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: In a land where beauty is preserved by the innocence of those who live there, two young people become entangled in the ongoing battle between good and evil.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In a future where time is literally money and aging stops at 25, the only way to stay alive is to earn, steal, or inherit more time.

programme.title: Max Winslow and the House of Secrets
programme.desc: Five teens are invited to the home of an eccentric billionaire to compete in a game to win his mansion. The night takes a dark turn when they become trapped in the house and are forced to face off against each other and an evil AI entity who controls everything in the house including their fate.

programme.title: Christmas With A Prince
programme.desc: Doctor Tasha reluctantly has to treat Prince Alexander in her ward. Will he become her knight (2019)

programme.title: A Christmas Break
programme.desc: (2020) Christmas romance with Cindy Sampson. To save her school from closure, a principal asks a Hollywood star - and former flame - to direct the school play. Will it set the stage for love?

programme.title: The Last Christmas Home
programme.desc: The Marvin sisters gather for what may be their last Christmas at their childhood home. Starring Erin Cahill (2018)

programme.title: Christmas in Toyland
programme.desc: (2022) Festive rom-com with Vanessa Lengies. Data analyst Charlie is sent to a thriving toy shop to replicate its formula. Can manager Grant's secrets to success open her mind... and heart?

programme.title: The Christmas Chalet
programme.desc: (2019) Festive rom-com starring Erica Durance. Sparks fly when a Christmas loving woman and a man who hates it double-book a chalet. But can the magic of Christmas thaw even the frostiest of hearts?

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.sub-title: A Treasure of Gold and Jade
programme.desc: Nearly a thousand years ago in ancient China, there was a cruel government. 108 renegade will try to change the story.

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: Nearly a thousand years ago in ancient China, there was a cruel government. 108 renegade will try to change the story.

programme.title: Relic Hunter
programme.desc: Tia Carrere ('Wayne's World') stars as Sydney Fox, a university professor and black belt who globe-trots after lost, stolen and rumored-to-exist artifacts and antiquities.

programme.title: Lake Placid (1999)
programme.desc: A female paleontologist from New York City heads to Maine where local fish and game officials have discovered a gigantic and deadly 30-foot crocodile that appears to be living in one of the local .akes.

programme.title: Doing Hard Time
programme.desc: Michael's seven-year-old son is killed in the crossfire of a drug deal gone bad. When the shootersget nothing but a short sentence for possession, Michael is outraged, and goes on a quest for revenge inside the prison where his son's killers are doing time.

programme.title: Dragon Wars
programme.desc: They've made our world their battleground

programme.title: American Outlaws
programme.desc: When a Midwest town learns that a corrupt railroad baron has captured the deeds to their homesteads without their knowledge, a group of young ranchers join forces to take back what is rightfully theirs.

programme.title: The Blue Lagoon (1980)
programme.desc: Brooke Shields and Christopher Atkins star as shipwrecked teenagers learning the mysteries of love in a South Pacific paradise.

programme.title: Five Nights in Maine
programme.desc: A man, reeling from the tragic loss of his wife, travels to rural Maine to seek answers from his estranged mother-in-law, who is herself confronting grief. With David Oyelowo and Dianne Wiest.

programme.title: The Buddy Holly Story
programme.desc: Buddy Holly laid the foundations for a generation of popular music with his ground-breaking combination of country music and rhythm & blues.

programme.title: Give Them Wings
programme.desc: Give Them Wings is based on the true story of wheelchair bound Paul Hodgson. A man who fought back and won.

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: Benicio del Toro & Tim Robbins star in this war zone comedy where a band of rescue workers are confronted with a crisis.

programme.title: Enemies Closer
programme.desc: Deep within a forest on the US-Canadian border, two sworn enemies must work together to escape a ruthless drug cartel hell-bent on retrieving a drug shipment which went missing there.

programme.title: The Double
programme.desc: An edge-of-your-seat espionage thriller, starring Richard Gere and Topher Grace as ex-CIA and FBI agents, trying to find the killer of a US senator, which bears the hallmark of an infamous Soviet assassin, thought to be dead.

programme.title: Mythica: The Iron Crown
programme.desc: Good and evil battle it out in the fourth gripping adventure from the fantastical franchise. When daring young wizard Marek steals the final piece of the all-powerful Darkspore she embarks on a desperate quest to deliver the cursed artefact to the gods.

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: Compromised by his affair with the first lady, a veteran secret service agent is framed as a potential presidential assassin and must rely on a hostile former protégé to flush out the real culprit.
